# uptime_integration_victorops (Resource)

VictorOps integration resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptime_integration_victorops" "example" {
  name        = "My VictorOps Integration"
  service_key = "your-victorops-service-key"
  routing_key = "production"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `service_key` (String, Sensitive) VictorOps service API key

### Optional

- `contact_groups` (Set of String) List of contact group names to receive notifications. 
Each contact group can contain multiple contacts (email addresses, phone numbers, or integrations) 
that will be notified when alerts are triggered. Defaults to ['Default'] if not specified.
- `routing_key` (String) VictorOps routing key

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `url` (String)
